item.title: HUB3: Pasta al pesto e pollo | Pasta penne med sprødstegt kylling og bagte cherry tomater, vendt grøn pesto | Toppet med brødkrummer, parmesan og basilikum | | Pasta al pesto e tofu | Pasta penne med sprødstegt tofu og bagte cherry tomater, vendt grøn pesto | Week 31 | Monday | Marinated and grilled beef onglet – On the side, Argentinian green chimichurri and patatas bravas with spicy tomato salsa and aioli | Marinated and grilled portobello – On the side, Argentinian green chimichurri and patatas bravas with spicy tomato salsa and aioli | Tuesday | Lasagna Bolognese a la ragu | Classic Italian lasagna with beef, bechamel sauce and mozzarella cheese | On the side, crispy tomato salad with feta cheese, red onion and basil | Wednesday | Falafel in flatbread | Smeared with baba ganoush | Filled and topped with fresh herbs, pickled onion, cucumber, tomato, lettuce and sour cream dressing | Cake of the day | Carrot cake with lemon and cream cheese frosting | Thursday | Breaded pork schnitzel | Served with roasted potatoes, lemon, capers, horseradish, peas, parsley and gravy | Breaded vegetable schnitzel | Friday | Pasta penne with crisp fried chicken and baked cherry tomatoes, tossed in green pesto | Topped with breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese and basil | Vegetar | Vegetarisk linse lasagne med bechamelsauce og mozzarellaost | Vegetarian | Vegetarian lentil lasagna with bechamel sauce and mozzarella cheese
